Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class AtomEntryResource

Represents a resource whose IRI is listed in a AtomFeed and uses AtomEntry as its representation.

AtomEntryResource(AtomId, AtomTextConstruct, DateTime)

Initializes a new instance of the AtomEntryResource class using the supplied AtomId, AtomTextConstruct, and System.DateTime.

Declaration
public AtomEntryResource(AtomId id, AtomTextConstruct title, DateTime updatedOn)
Parameters
Type Name Description
AtomId id

A AtomId object that represents a permanent, universally unique identifier for this entry.
AtomTextConstruct title

A AtomTextConstruct object that represents information that conveys a human-readable title for this entry.
System.DateTime updatedOn

A System.DateTime that indicates the most recent instant in time when this entry was modified in a way the publisher considers significant. The System.DateTime should be provided in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The id is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.ArgumentNullException

The title is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
| Improve this Doc View Source

AtomTextConstruct title

A AtomTextConstruct object that represents information that conveys a human-readable title for this entry.
System.DateTime updatedOn

A System.DateTime that indicates the most recent instant in time when this entry was modified in a way the publisher considers significant. The System.DateTime should be provided in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
System.DateTime editedOn

A System.DateTime that indicates the most recent instant in time when this entry was edited. The System.DateTime should be provided in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

Declaration
public AtomEntryResource(AtomId id, AtomTextConstruct title, DateTime updatedOn, DateTime editedOn, bool isDraft)
Parameters
Type Name Description
AtomId id

A AtomId object that represents a permanent, universally unique identifier for this entry.
AtomTextConstruct title

A AtomTextConstruct object that represents information that conveys a human-readable title for this entry.
System.DateTime updatedOn

A System.DateTime that indicates the most recent instant in time when this entry was modified in a way the publisher considers significant. The System.DateTime should be provided in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
System.DateTime editedOn

A System.DateTime that indicates the most recent instant in time when this entry was edited. The System.DateTime should be provided in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
System.Boolean isDraft

A value indicating if client has requested to control the visibility of the entry.

Properties

| Improve this Doc View Source

EditedOn

Gets or sets a date-time indicating the most recent instant in time when this entry was edited.

Declaration
public DateTime EditedOn { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.DateTime

A System.DateTime that indicates the most recent instant in time when this entry was edited. If the entry has not been edited yet, indicates the time the entry was created. The default value is System.DateTime.MinValue, which indicates that no edit time was provided.
Remarks

The System.DateTime should be provided in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

See Also
AtomPublishingEditedSyndicationExtension
| Improve this Doc View Source

IsDraft

Gets or sets a value indicating whether client has requested to control the visibility of this entry.

Declaration
public bool IsDraft { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean

true if the client is requesting to control the visibility of this entry; otherwise false. The default value is false.
See Also
AtomPublishingControlSyndicationExtension

Load(Uri, WebRequestOptions, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings)

Loads the syndication resource from the supplied System.Uri using the specified System.Net.ICredentials, System.Net.IWebProxy and SyndicationResourceLoadSettings.

Declaration
public void Load(Uri source, WebRequestOptions options, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Uri source

A System.Uri that points to the location of the web resource used to load the syndication resource.
WebRequestOptions options

A WebRequestOptions that holds options that should be applied to web requests.
SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings

The SyndicationResourceLoadSettings object used to configure the AtomEntry instance. This value can be null.
Remarks

  • If settings has a CharacterEncoding of System.Text.Encoding.UTF8 the character encoding of the source will be attempt to be determined automatically, otherwise the specified character encoding will be used. If automatic detection fails, a character encoding of System.Text.Encoding.UTF8 is used by default.
  • After the load operation has successfully completed, the Loaded event will be raised.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The source is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.FormatException

The source data does not conform to the expected syndication content format. In this case, the entry remains empty.
System.Xml.XmlException

There is a load or parse error in the XML. In this case, the entry remains empty.
| Improve this Doc View Source

Load(Uri, ICredentials, IWebProxy, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings)

Loads the syndication resource from the supplied System.Uri using the specified System.Net.ICredentials, System.Net.IWebProxy and SyndicationResourceLoadSettings.

Declaration
public void Load(Uri source, ICredentials credentials, IWebProxy proxy, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Uri source

A System.Uri that points to the location of the web resource used to load the syndication resource.
System.Net.ICredentials credentials

A System.Net.ICredentials that provides the proper set of credentials to the source resource when required. This value can be null.
System.Net.IWebProxy proxy

A System.Net.IWebProxy that provides proxy access to the source resource when required. This value can be null.
SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings

The SyndicationResourceLoadSettings object used to configure the AtomEntry instance. This value can be null.
Remarks

  • If credentials is null, request is made using the default application credentials.
  • If proxy is null, request is made using the System.Net.WebRequest default proxy settings.
  • If settings has a CharacterEncoding of System.Text.Encoding.UTF8 the character encoding of the source will be attempt to be determined automatically, otherwise the specified character encoding will be used. If automatic detection fails, a character encoding of System.Text.Encoding.UTF8 is used by default.
  • After the load operation has successfully completed, the Loaded event will be raised.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The source is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.FormatException

The source data does not conform to the expected syndication content format. In this case, the entry remains empty.
System.Xml.XmlException

There is a load or parse error in the XML. In this case, the entry remains empty.
| Improve this Doc View Source

Declaration
public void Load(IXPathNavigable source, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings)
Parameters

The IXPathNavigable used to load the syndication resource.
SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings

The SyndicationResourceLoadSettings object used to configure the AtomEntry instance. This value can be null.
Remarks

After the load operation has successfully completed, the Loaded event will be raised.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The source is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.FormatException

The source data does not conform to the expected syndication content format. In this case, the entry remains empty.
System.Xml.XmlException

There is a load or parse error in the XML. In this case, the entry remains empty.

LoadAsync(Uri, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings, WebRequestOptions, Object)

Loads this AtomEntry instance asynchronously using the specified System.Uri, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings, System.Net.ICredentials, and System.Net.IWebProxy.

Declaration
public void LoadAsync(Uri source, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings, WebRequestOptions options, object userToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Uri source

A System.Uri that represents the URL of the syndication resource XML data.
SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings

The SyndicationResourceLoadSettings object used to configure the AtomEntry instance. This value can be null.
WebRequestOptions options

A WebRequestOptions that holds options that should be applied to web requests.
System.Object userToken

A user-defined object that is passed to the method invoked when the asynchronous operation completes.
Remarks

To receive notification when the operation has completed or the operation has been canceled, add an event handler to the Loaded event. You can cancel a LoadAsync(Uri, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings, ICredentials, IWebProxy, Object) operation by calling the LoadAsyncCancel() method.

After calling LoadAsync(Uri, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings, ICredentials, IWebProxy, Object), you must wait for the load operation to complete before attempting to load the syndication resource using the LoadAsync(Uri, Object) method.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The source is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.FormatException

The source data does not conform to the expected syndication content format. In this case, the feed remains empty.
System.InvalidOperationException

This AtomEntry has a LoadAsync(Uri, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings, ICredentials, IWebProxy, Object) call in progress.
| Improve this Doc View Source

LoadAsync(Uri, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings, ICredentials, IWebProxy, Object)

Loads this AtomEntry instance asynchronously using the specified System.Uri, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings, System.Net.ICredentials, and System.Net.IWebProxy.

Declaration
public void LoadAsync(Uri source, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings, ICredentials credentials, IWebProxy proxy, object userToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Uri source

A System.Uri that represents the URL of the syndication resource XML data.
SyndicationResourceLoadSettings settings

The SyndicationResourceLoadSettings object used to configure the AtomEntry instance. This value can be null.
System.Net.ICredentials credentials

A System.Net.ICredentials that provides the proper set of credentials to the source when required. This value can be null.
System.Net.IWebProxy proxy

A System.Net.IWebProxy that provides proxy access to the source when required. This value can be null.
System.Object userToken

A user-defined object that is passed to the method invoked when the asynchronous operation completes.
Remarks

To receive notification when the operation has completed or the operation has been canceled, add an event handler to the Loaded event. You can cancel a LoadAsync(Uri, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings, ICredentials, IWebProxy, Object) operation by calling the LoadAsyncCancel() method.

After calling LoadAsync(Uri, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings, ICredentials, IWebProxy, Object), you must wait for the load operation to complete before attempting to load the syndication resource using the LoadAsync(Uri, Object) method.

Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The source is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.FormatException

The source data does not conform to the expected syndication content format. In this case, the feed remains empty.
System.InvalidOperationException

This AtomEntry has a LoadAsync(Uri, SyndicationResourceLoadSettings, ICredentials, IWebProxy, Object) call in progress.
| Improve this Doc View Source

LoadAsyncCancel()

Cancels an asynchronous operation to load this syndication resource.

Declaration
public void LoadAsyncCancel()
Remarks

Use the LoadAsyncCancel method to cancel a pending LoadAsync(Uri, Object) operation. If there is a load operation in progress, this method releases resources used to execute the load operation. If there is no load operation pending, this method does nothing.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Save(XmlWriter, SyndicationResourceSaveSettings)

Saves the syndication resource to the specified System.Xml.XmlWriter and SyndicationResourceSaveSettings.

Declaration
public void Save(XmlWriter writer, SyndicationResourceSaveSettings settings)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Xml.XmlWriter writer

The XmlWriter to which you want to save the syndication resource.
SyndicationResourceSaveSettings settings

The SyndicationResourceSaveSettings object used to configure the persistence of the AtomEntry instance.
Exceptions
Type Condition
System.ArgumentNullException

The writer is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.ArgumentNullException

The settings is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
System.Xml.XmlException

The operation would not result in well formed XML for the syndication resource.
